snippet.title: Before We Leave - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Before We Leave is a non-violent city building game set in your own cozy corner of the universe.  Rediscover and rebuild civilization. Create a multi-planet resource network.  Overcome ancient challenges and fend off hungry space whales.

Join the Discord for Closed Alpha access and an idle game at https://discord.gg/beforeweleave, and find us on the Epic Game Store at https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/before-we-leave/home!

Music by Matt Caradus
